Uses of Package
org.jcouchdb.db

Packages that use org.jcouchdb.db
org.jcouchdb.db Contains the main classes of the jcouchdb driver. 
org.jcouchdb.exception Contains the exceptions thrown by the driver. 
org.jcouchdb.util Contains some utility classes.
